title: Mufaro's beautiful daughters (K)
creator_credit: David R. Paight, Paul R. Gagne and Weston Woods Studios
brief_description: Everyone agrees that Mufaro’s two daughters are very beautiful - the kind Nyasha, and the selfish Manyara. When the king decides to take a wife, the girls are unknowingly tested to reveal which is worthy enough to be the queen. Based on the book by John Steptoe.
creator_credit_for_label: David R. Paight, Paul R. Gagne and Weston Woods Studios
